trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for deferring correlation key calculation until all of the correlation data is available.
This is typically used to allow other channels to provide correlation data before a message is sent on the wire.
Called by derived classes to initialize a new instance of the derived class using the specified collection of correlation data that is required to calculate the correlation.
The correlation data required to calculate the correlation.

Called by derived classes to initialize a new instance of the derived class using the required correlation data from another <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty"></xref> derived class instance.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty"></xref> derived class instance to copy.
Adds required correlation data to the property.
When required correlation data is added, it is removed from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.NeededData%2A> list.

When all required data has been added, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.NeededData%2A> list is empty and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.IsFullyDefined%2A> returns `true`.
The name of the correlation data value.
Provides the value of the correlation data.
Called by a correlation protocol when all of the correlation information is available to asynchronously construct the correlation.
This method calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnBeginFinalizeCorrelation%2A> to construct the correlation.

Applications must provide an implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnBeginFinalizeCorrelation%2A>, which asynchronously performs the correlation calculation of the specified message.
To be notified when the asynchronous operation is complete, call <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.EndFinalizeCorrelation%2A> from the `callback` method.
If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.EndFinalizeCorrelation%2A> is called before the asynchronous operation is complete, it blocks until the operation completes.
If the operation does not complete within the specified time-out interval a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown.

This method is an asynchronous version of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.FinalizeCorrelation%2A> using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> asynchronous design pattern.
[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)][Asynchronous Programming Overview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141764).
The message to be correlated.
The interval in which correlation must be finalized or else a <xref href="System.TimeoutException"></xref> is thrown.
The method to be called when the correlation calculation is completed.
An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
A reference to the current asynchronous operation.
When overridden in a derived class, initializes and returns a copy of the derived message property instance.
A copy of the derived message property instance.
Returns the message that was prepared asynchronously for correlation.
This method calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnEndFinalizeCorrelation%2A> to retrieve the message.

Applications must provide an implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnEndFinalizeCorrelation%2A>, which returns the message that was prepared for correlation.
If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.EndFinalizeCorrelation%2A> is called before the asynchronous operation is complete, it blocks until the operation completes.

If the operation did not complete within the time-out interval specified in the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.BeginFinalizeCorrelation%2A> a <xref:System.TimeoutException> is thrown when this method is called.

This method completes the asynchronous version of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.FinalizeCorrelation%2A> using the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> asynchronous design pattern.
[!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)][Asynchronous Programming Overview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=141764).

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that references the asynchronous <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.BeginFinalizeCorrelation(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> operation.
The message that was prepared for correlation.
Called by a correlation protocol when all of the correlation information is available to construct the correlation.
This method calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnFinalizeCorrelation%2A> to construct the correlation.

Applications must provide an implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.OnFinalizeCorrelation%2A>, which performs the correlation calculation of the specified message.
The message to be correlated.
The interval in which the correlation calculation must be completed or else a <xref href="System.TimeoutException"></xref> is thrown.
The correlated message.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty"></xref> has all of the required correlation data.

When all required data has been added, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.NeededData%2A> list is empty and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.IsFullyDefined%2A> returns `true`.
`true` if all of the required correlation data is present; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the name of this message property: "CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty".
The string value "CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty".
Gets a list of correlation data that is required before correlation can be applied.
A list of required correlation data.
When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously performs the correlation calculation for the specified message.
This method is called by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.BeginFinalizeCorrelation%2A>.
The message to be correlated.
The interval in which the correlation calculation must be completed or else a <xref href="System.TimeoutException"></xref> is thrown.
The method to be called when the correlation calculation has been completed.
An optional application-specific object that contains information about the asynchronous operation.
A reference to the current asynchronous operation.
When overridden in a derived class, returns the message that was prepared asynchronously for correlation.
This method is called by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.EndFinalizeCorrelation%2A>.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that references the asynchronous <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.BeginFinalizeCorrelation(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.TimeSpan,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> operation.
The correlated message.
When overridden in a derived class, performs the correlation calculation for the specified message.
This method is called by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty.FinalizeCorrelation%2A>.
The message to be correlated.
The interval in which the correlation calculation must be completed or else a <xref href="System.TimeoutException"></xref> is thrown.
The correlated message.

Attempts to get a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty"></xref> from the specified message’s <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties"></xref>.
The message that contains the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties"></xref> to inspect.

When this method returns, contains the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty"></xref> contained in the specified message’s <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties"></xref>; otherwise, `null`.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.

`true` if the message’s <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties"></xref> contain a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Attempts to get a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty"></xref> from the specified message properties.
The message properties to inspect.
When this method returns, contains the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty"></xref> contained in the specified message properties; otherwise, `null`.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` if the message properties contain a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationCallbackMessageProperty"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
